Nav.EndingPageButton: Get started - save my first mistake

AboutMistakesJournal.HeaderFirstPart: Get the most out of your mistakes

Step1.Text: We help you to save and organize your mistakes, so you can get the most out of them.

Step2.Text: Some mistakes are not easy, but we do our best to help you reflect on them, so you can have the lessons and tips for future.

Step3.Text: We will motivate you to avoid the same mistakes in the future.
Step3.Text2: Track your mistakes and verify if your tips are helpful or need an adjustment.

AboutMistakesJournal.HeaderEndPage2: Don't waste it and get started
AboutMistakesJournal.ButtonEndPage: Get started - save my first mistake

Mistakes.Title: Mistakes
Mistakes.EmptyList: Here you will see your mistakes list.
Mistakes.EmptyList2: Don't hesitate and add your first one!

MistakeForm.Name: Name
MistakeForm.NamePlaceholder: e.g. I spend too much time on Netflix.
MistakeForm.WhatCanIDoBetter: What can I do better next time?
MistakeForm.OnlyResponsible: Am I the only one responsible?

FormErrors.MaxLength: Length shouldn't be longer than {max} characters.

DeleteLabel.Title: Deleting a label
DeleteLabel.Content: Are you sure you want to delete label "{name}"?

LocationAccess.Denied: Access to geolocation was not granted. In order to take part in the research grant Mistake Journal access to geolocation.

ServerErrors.Unauthorized: User not logged in. Access login page to use the application.
ServerErrors.UnknownError: Unknown error occurred. Try again later or contact system administrator.
ServerErrors.Required: Not all required fields were given.
ServerErrors.TooOldRepetition: Mistake repetition cannot be day before.
ServerErrors.DateInFuture: Date is given in the future.
ServerErrors.DoesNotMatchPattern: Value does not match required pattern.
ServerErrors.TooMuchItemsExist: You have already added too many items of given type.
ServerErrors.TooMuchTipsExist: You have already added too many tips.
ServerErrors.TooLong: One or more fields have too many characters.

Step0.Text: Mistakes are my speciality! I will help you to eliminate them. Follow me to quickly show you around!

Step1.Text: Add your mistakes and see progress towards eliminating them!

Step2.Text: Create labels and tag your mistakes to better organize them!

Step3.Text: Find all your mistakes that you managed to eliminate!

Step4.Text: Tips management and other features will be coming soon! I'll notify you when they are available!

Step5.Text: No worries, it's easy! Just fill out a quick form (or select deep analyzer for more tips), add priority and tag it!

Step6.Text: Now you can control your progress towards eliminating the mistake! 66 days left, unless you repeat it and reset the progress bar!
